metadata.title: MZ announcing expansion of Prineville, Oregon data center.
metadata.description: MZ announcing expansion of Prineville, Oregon data center.

contents.participant: Back in 2011, we opened our first data center in Prineville, Oregon. Today we announced we're expanding it and adding two more massive buildings to support the growth of our global community. Like all our data centers, this one is powered by 100% renewable energy. And this will create another 100 jobs at the data center and up to 1500 jobs during construction.
